quote: Then, aided by the booze, like a fool I tossed off one of those throwaway lines that would have been better thrown away. ""Ah, Frank! I thought you were going to be down here fucking Lana.
quote_letters: THEN AIDED BY THE BOOZE LIKE A FOOL I TOSSED OFF ONE OF THOSE THROWAWAY LINES THAT WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER THROWN AWAY AH FRANK I THOUGHT YOU WERE GOING TO BE DOWN HERE FUCKING LANA
